sourcesContent:
// src/data/products.js
export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "forever aloe first® Spray",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 15000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_first_spray.jpg",
    description: "Spray apaisant et rafraîchissant à l'Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10605",
    stock: 18,
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Aloe Heat Lotion",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 11500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_heat_lotion.jpg",
    description: "Lotion chauffante thérapeutique à base d'Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10500",
    stock: 22,
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Forever Aloe Liquid Soap®",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 14500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_liquid_soap.jpg",
    description: "Savon liquide doux enrichi en Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10602",
    stock: 25,
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Forever Aloe Body Lotion®",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 17000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_body_lotion.jpg",
    description: "Lotion corporelle nourrissante à l'Aloe Vera pur.",
    code: "10598",
    stock: 15,
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Forever Aloe Body Wash®",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 17000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_body_wash.jpg",
    description: "Gel douche hydratant à l'Aloe Vera, crémeux et moussant.",
    code: "10599",
    stock: 20,
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Forever Aloe Lips®",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 3000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_lips.jpg",
    description: "Baume à lèvres nourrissant et protecteur à l'Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10594",
    stock: 35,
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Forever Bright® Toothgel",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 12500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/bright_toothgel.jpg",
    description: "Dentifrice à l'Aloe Vera sans fluor, au goût mentholé frais.",
    code: "10604",
    stock: 28,
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "Forever Aloe Berry Nectar®",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 21000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/aloe_berry_nectar.jpg",
    description: "Boisson savoureuse combinant le gel pur d'Aloe Vera à la pulpe de pomme et cranberry.",
    code: "10607",
    stock: 12,
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Forever Freedom®",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 28500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/forever_freedom.jpg",
    description: "Boisson à l'Aloe Vera enrichie en glucosamine et chondroïtine.",
    code: "10608",
    stock: 10,
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "Forever Vital 5® Aloe Gel",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 29000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/vital_5_aloe_gel.jpg",
    description: "Gel d'Aloe Vera pur stabilisé à boire, le produit phare de Forever.",
    code: "10612",
    stock: 8,
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Forever ARGI+®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 57500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/argi_plus.jpg",
    description: "Complément alimentaire à base de L-Arginine, vitamines et extraits de fruits.",
    code: "10013",
    stock: 6,
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Forever Absorbent-C®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 13750,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/absorbent_c.jpg",
    description: "Vitamine C avec extrait d'avoine pour une absorption optimale.",
    code: "10009",
    stock: 24,
  },
  {
    id: 13,
    name: "Forever Daily®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 15000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/forever_daily.jpg",
    description: "Complexe multivitaminé et minéral complet pour les besoins quotidiens.",
    code: "10019",
    stock: 18,
  },
  {
    id: 14,
    name: "Forever Immublend®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 17500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/immublend.jpg",
    description: "Complexe de champignons médicinaux et plantes adaptogènes.",
    code: "10022",
    stock: 16,
  },
  {
    id: 15,
    name: "Forever Bee Propolis®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 25500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/bee_propolis.jpg",
    description: "Propolis d'abeille pure, un trésor de la ruche pour l'immunité.",
    code: "10016",
    stock: 14,
  }
];
